text.section:
The Committee consists of the following members:
As ex officio members:
The Secretary, or the Secretary's designee;
The Secretary of Natural Resources, or the Secretary's designee;
The Secretary of Transportation, or the Secretary's designee;
The Secretary of the Environment, or the Secretary's designee; and
The Dean of the College of Agriculture and Natural Resources at the University of Maryland, College Park, or the Dean's designee; and
Appointed by the Secretary:
In consultation with the Secretary of Natural Resources:
Two individuals with experience with invasive plants, agriculture, horticulture, gardening, conservation, or other relevant experience; and
One consumer member.

section.section: The term of an appointed member is 3 years and begins on January 1.
An appointed member may not serve more than two consecutive terms.

text.section: An appointed member shall serve at the pleasure of the Secretary.
